homepage.hello: Soon, a Bitcoin ATM open 24/7 in Geneva city-center.
homepage.subtitle: Easy Bitcoin Saving

error.ButanukiAccountPreviouslyLinkedToOtherBi: This Butanuki account was previously linked to another Bity account.
error.CantRefreshBityToken: Please try again. If the error persists, please disconnect your Butanuki account from Bity, then reconnect it.
error.NeedVerifiedBityAccount: You must verify your account and your IBAN (with <kycLink>Bity.com</kycLink>) before being able to setup a DCA with Butanuki. <kycLink>Click here to verify your account</kycLink>.
error.Unknown: An unknown error occured. Please try again later.
error.UnknownBityError: Please try again. If the error persists, please disconnect your Butanuki account from Bity, then reconnect it.
error.TooManyOrdersInVault: You have too many orders in your piggy bank.
error.TooManyVaults: You have too many piggy banks.

login.enter_email: Enter your email to receive a unique login link

bity.broken: It looks like the link between Butanuki and your Bity.com account is broken.
bity.create_bity: If you don't have a verified Bity.com account yet, <link1>Click here</link1> to create one.

order.warning_reset: Warning, you will get a new Bank Transfer Reference

order.name_placeholder: You can set a name for this order to easily find it
order.creating: Creating a new order in your piggy bank {{name}}
order.cancelled_warning: Warning, this order has been cancelled by Bity. You need to reconfigure it to make it work again.

vault.name: Name
vault.maxReached: You've reached the maximum number of piggy banks you can create. ({{max}})

statistics.total_spent_desc: Total amount of {{currency}} saved in this piggy bank.

results.phrase: Als ik <currencyInput /> <itemPrice/> <nb>aan Bitcoin had uitgegeven</nb> in plaats van dit <frequency/> aan <object/> te besteden <nb>sinds <startInput/></nb>, <loader><nb>dan zou ik</nb> <t>{{saved}} gespaard hebben,<t/> en <nb>zou ik vandaag </nb> ongeveer <t>{{bitcoinAmount}}</t> bitcoin hebben, ter waarde van <t>{{bitcoinValue}}</t>, ofwel <nb>een <t>{{profitOrLoss}}</t></nb> <nb>van <t>{{profitLoss}}</t> <small>(<percentPL/>)</small>.</nb></loader>
results.share: Als ik {{price}} aan #Bitcoin had uitgegeven in plaats van {{frequency}} aan {{object}} te besteden sinds {{start}}, dan zou ik {{saved}} gespaard hebben, en zou ik vandaag {{bitcoinAmount}} hebben, ter waarde van {{bitcoinValue}}, ofwel een {{profitOrLoss}} van {{profitLoss}} ({{percentPL}}).
